traits.name: Source
traits.desc: tales from the yawning portal,  page 235

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The giant crayfish can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant crayfish makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). The crayfish has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.
